PropertyList.text:
WEIGHTS --------- Maximum takeoff weight in nominal conditions is 9800 kg. Maximum takeoff weight when temps are below 15 degrees celcius is 10500 kg. Maximum takeoff weight with JATO is 9100 kg. Takeoff weight on dirt runways is 8800 kg.
Landing weight is 6800 kg. Emergency landing weight is 7300 kg.
Empty weight is 6100 kg. Empty weight plus full internal fuel is ~8250 kg.
STARTUP --------- If using the automatic startup, you still should do a couple things: 1) Set the fuel guage - the fuel gauge does not automatically set to the level in the tank, you need to set the initial level. 2) Slave the gyrocompass - hold down the FDS button until the HI compass settles. The compass will drift over time, press the FDS button every now and again to reslave. 2b) Set the magnetic declination instrument to your current latitude to help minimize gyro error. INFO 3) Turn on the auxilary hydraulics for full aileron control.
--------- - Check the installation directory for a how-to guide on weapons employment. - Second reheat (ctrl-f) is only effective below 15,000 feet MSL, and use should be limited to 3 minutes. - Smokepod colors are available in the dropdown menu. - The gunsight has fully customizable colors via the dropdown menu.
